title: How to write an essay about an amazing person - Quora

response.answer_text: You could approach this in a number of ways. Is your essay about an individual that is amazing or is it about what it means to be an amazing person? If you are to write an essay about an individual, start by explaining what makes them amazing. Talk about those events that led to this person becoming so amazing and then what this means in their life and how they have impacted others.
